name: Samir Kumar
position: SDE-1 at Kotak | Graduate IIT Kharagpur '23
about: Motivated and results-oriented Software Developer with one year of experience, specializing in CRM platform development using Salesforce. Successfully contributed to the enhancement and maintenance of the CRM system at Kotak Mahindra Bank, optimizing client management processes and improving operational efficiency. Proficient in Javascript, Apex, and SQL, with a strong understanding of data integration and workflow automation. Committed to continuous learning and excited to advance my expertise in emerging technologies and softwares. Seeking to leverage my skills and experience to drive innovative solutions in a dynamic team environment.
